channel.title: GPG Git and Automated Debian +Tor installs
channel.description:
A couple of interesting things in [this](https://anarc.at/blog/2020-03-17-git-gpg-verification/#problem-statement) blog post:
* Retroactively verifying git commits with GPG * [Mention of automated installs of Debian with Tor support out of the box](https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/ticket/31239)
